pr_title: Map more 1.16 additions to default biome features

timeline.message: Map the remaining Nether feature configs
Map the configured ruined portal features

timeline.bodyText: Why did you name these with CONFIGURED?
timeline.author: Kroppeb

replies.bodyText: There isn't any precedent with configured features in this class, but since the feature configs have the _CONFIG suffix, I added it to the ruined portal configured features to be consistent in detail.
replies.author: haykam821

replies.bodyText: I guess we can go with @Kroppeb and drop CONFIGURED from name, as there is no version that is not configured.
replies.author: liach
